Name: Flirtini #2
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: A flirtatious little number that slips down easily.
History: Adapted from a recipe by the New York bartender Dale DeGroff.
Nutrition: One serving of Flirtini #2 contains 133 calories
